caseTitle: Mst. Ghazala v. The State thr. A.G. Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and another
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Principles of law regulating the discretion of courts, under Section 497(1) CrPC, in the matter of granting post arrest bail to women accused, reiterated and the distinction between granting bail under Section 497(1) and under Section 497(2) CrPC, explained.
